Text.val: @@Author: Andreas Sedlmeier
Implements CV2113_01 which gets invoked when a user does reset his passwort in login screen
17.02.2012 In NL f.i. we do not get an admin number, we need to lookup that from CADM ...
when this program is runnin there is still no Session ID
This is not a Standard ICA program
remove until X2 lleading zeros
User is NOT blocked but does use reset functionality. This is allowed.
User identified himself correctly (admno/clntno/email) and we are allowed to unblock
Forllowing is steps 2-5 from specification
Step#2 Unblock the CUSR account and reset passowrd to generic (random) ...
Password has been created, and CUSR account has been reset. Inform user by email
there should be only one row with type 4
Initialization ....
Get generic (random) password ....
Change password of User to generic (random) ....
Reset BLOCKED ....
Text for email subject ....
Text for email message ..
2.nd try with GB (englisch) in case there's no localized version ....
Insert new password ....
Send email with new password to CUSR
Send email to operators to inform them about fact that CUSR did reset his password ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'password for client CLIENT_USER has been automatically reset due to client request'
